column4: hmm, any ideas why i wouldn't have a menu.lst?  I need to enable showing of the GRUB menu and all the tuts reference that file...
if you're using ubuntu 9.10, it uses grub2 now, look at grub.cfg
Ah okay, i do have that...  Good to know :)  I'll try and find a tut on showing the menu with that version, then, thanks!
